resources.string: A decoration to identify a new question beginning
This is a mockup question to check the layout.
This button sets the answer to False.
This button sets the answer to False.

string-array.name: ScoreEvaluation
string-array.item: No! Just no! You did it on purpose didn\'t you?
Surely you can do better than this! Try reading NG History!
You were unlucky! Read NG History and you will surely improve!
You\'re in the middle. NG History can help you raise to the top!
Not the worst score there is. Surely you could use NG History!
A nice score indeed. But still far from the top. Read NG History to reach further!
Quite a satisfying result! You can smooth your culture by reading some more NG History!
My sincere congratulations. Dare to approach perfection? Read NG History!
You raised the bar! For more interesting facts keep reading NG History!
